title: Centaur III - Apotheosis
credit_line: Gift of Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Benton Murdoch Spruance [1904-1967], Philadelphia, PA; Frank K. M. Rehn, Inc., New York, NY, until May 1955 [1]; Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, May 1955 until April 11, 1957 [1]; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, April 1957.

Notes:
[1]. Mrs. Beal purchased the lithograph from the Rehn gallery for $35 in May 1955 (see invoice dated May 4, 1955 and receipt of payment from the gallery in curatorial file.)
[2]. The lithograph is listed on a Carnegie Institute form as received "for later gift" on May 15, 1956; it was accessioned on April 11, 1957.
